opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed en banc on application for supersedeas without written opinion. Mr. Justice Burke, sitting for Mr. Chief Justice Campbell. Mr. Justice Bouck not participating.

posture.italic: Error to the District Court of the City and County of
Denver, Hon. Charles C. Sackmann, Judge.

opinion.attorneys:
Mr. CHARLES E. FRIEND, for plaintiff in error.
Mr. A. D. QUAINTANCE, Mr. ALLYN COLE, Mr. E. B. EVANS, for defendant in error.Page 447
